description: This celery soup recipe couldn't be simpler to make and is delicious served with crusty bread.
keywords: Vegetable soup,Seafood free,Wheat free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato
name: Creamy Celery Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cups vegetable stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, deep saucepan and cook the celery, garlic and potatoes for 1 minute, stirring. Add a splash of water and the salt cook for 15 minutes, stirring often.
Pour in the stock, bring to the boil and reduce the heat. Simmer for 20 minutes, until tender.
Blitz until smooth with an immersion blender, stir in the cream and serve.
